long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing Twitter you may find profiles imposing someone else, by signing up with a very similar name (eg. @bestmaik -> @bestmajk) and/or a very similar profile picture. As these profiles are mostly trying to scam you and annoy your experience with false content, I wrote this extension which is able to identify those profiles and hide their tweets, if they are answering on profiles they are trying to impose.
